channel.title: dry vermouth on Cocktails collected by Daniel Mentiplay
channel.description: Recent content in dry vermouth on Cocktails collected by Daniel Mentiplay

item.title: Brooklyn
item.description: Ingredients 50 ml rye whisky 20 ml dry vermouth 7.5 ml amaro 5 ml Maraschino liqueur orange twist Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve up. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Martini
item.description: Ingredients 60 ml gin 20 ml dry vermouth 4 dashes orange bitters lemon twist olives Instructions Stir ingredients (orange bitters are optional). Make sure the drink and glass are cold. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist or olives.

item.title: Old pal
item.description: Ingredients 30 ml rye whisky 30 ml Campari 30 ml dry vermouth Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve in rocks glass over ice. Garnish with orange slice.

item.title: Scofflaw
item.description: Ingredients 50 ml rye whisky 25 ml dry vermouth 10 ml grenadine 4 dashes orange bitters 15 ml lemon juice lemon twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist.
